original_text: And all Israel, and their elders, and officers, and their judges, stood on this side the ark and on that side before the priests the Levites, which bare the ark of the covenant of the Lord, as well the stranger, as he that was born among them; half of them over against mount Gerizim, and half of them over against mount Ebal; as Moses the servant of the Lord had commanded before, that they should bless the people of Israel.
korean_text: 온 이스라엘과 그 장로들과 관리들과 재판장들과 본토인뿐 아니라 이방인까지 여호와의 언약궤를 멘 레위 사람 제사장들 앞에서 궤의 좌우에 서되 절반은 그리심 산 앞에, 절반은 에발 산 앞에 섰으니 이는 전에 여호와의 종 모세가 이스라엘 백성에게 축복하라고 명령한 대로 함이라

sentences.original_text: stood on this side the ark
and on that side before the priests
which bare the ark of the covenant of the Lord
as he that was born among them
half of them over against mount Gerizim
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 절반은 그리심 산 맞은편에

sentences.original_text: and half of them over against mount Ebal
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 절반은 에발 산 맞은편에 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: as Moses the servant of the Lord had commanded before
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 종 모세가 이전에 명령했던 대로

sentences.original_text: that they should bless the people of Israel
